title: Attn: Students and Professionals
posting_body: This is a house rental.
We are located in Wade Park.
-1 mile north of the Case Western Campus
-2 miles east of Cleveland clinic
-1 mile away from Cleveland Institute of Music
The house is 3 stories, full basement and approximately 5500 square feet.
We have done over $100,000 in remodeling on property from top to bottom.
The atmosphere/environment is extremely quiet.
There is a great deal of landlord neglect in the rental business.
We want you to look forward to coming home.
Case students, university hospital and Cleveland clinic professionals.
This is a must see.
Nothing like it on the rental market.
-All utilities included:(gas, water, sewage, electric, WiFi, HD cable, washer/dryer, etc.)
-Close commute (walking distance to Case, Clinic, Little Italy, University Hospital, and VA)
- free onsite parking
-This has been a complete remodel from top to bottom
-All amenities included (bed, dresser, leather couch, tables, TV, etc.)
This opportunity wont last long.
Be the first to move into this completely updated house.
Please contact Dominic
